item.title: Agentic Document Processing: The Evolution Beyond Traditional IDP
item.description: The emergence of Agentic Document Processing (ADP) represents a fundamental architectural shift in how organizations approach document-centric automation. Unlike traditional Intelligent Document Processing (IDP), which operates as a passive extraction and classification layer, ADP introduces autonomous decision-making capabilities that can orchestrate complex workflows, leverage enterprise context, and adapt to evolving business requirements without explicit reprogramming.

item.title: ABBYY
item.description: ABBYY is a global provider of intelligent document processing, content AI, and language solutions. The company is known for its advanced OCR (Optical Character Recognition) technology and document capture solutions.

item.title: Box
item.description: Box is a leading cloud content management platform that enables organizations to securely manage, share, and collaborate on their content from anywhere, on any device, while maintaining enterprise-grade security and compliance.

item.title: Datamatics
item.description: Datamatics is a digital technology company providing intelligent document processing solutions through its TruCap+ platform.

item.title: Hyperscience
item.description: Hyperscience is a market leader in intelligent document processing and hyperautomation, leveraging advanced AI and machine learning technologies to transform how organizations handle complex documents and automate data extraction.

item.title: Infrrd
item.description: Infrrd provides AI-powered intelligent document processing solutions that enable organizations to extract data from complex documents and automate document-centric business processes.

item.title: Klippa (acquired by SER Group)
item.description: Klippa is a technology company specializing in intelligent document processing (IDP) and OCR solutions that automate data extraction from various document types. In 2025, Klippa was acquired by SER Group, a leading provider of intelligent content automation solutions.

item.title: Nanonets
item.description: [Nanonets]](https://nanonets.com/) is an AI-powered intelligent document processing and workflow automation cloud platform that leverages advanced OCR and machine learning to extract data from unstructured documents and automate document-intensive business processes.

item.title: Ocrolus
item.description: Ocrolus is a company that specializes in intelligent document processing and financial document analysis solutions. The company focuses on creating intelligent automation for document workflows.

item.title: TCG Process
item.description: TCG Process provides intelligent document processing and business process automation solutions that help organizations transform document-centric workflows through AI-powered technologies.

item.title: IDP-Software
item.description: Definitions Compiled from Multiple Sources

item.title: 4Semantics
item.description: 4Semantics is a Polish intelligent document processing provider that develops the SensID Cognitive Automation platform for automated document data extraction and workflow automation.

item.title: Adobe
item.description: Adobe is a company that specializes in intelligent document processing and creative software solutions. The company focuses on creating intelligent automation for document workflows.

item.title: AOTM
item.description: AOTM is an intelligent document processing platform developed by Ninestars that uses AI and machine learning for data extraction from business documents.

item.title: Ascron
item.description: Ascron is a Polish intelligent document processing provider specializing in legal services and debt collection management automation.

item.title: Automation Anywhere
item.description: Automation Anywhere is an AI-powered process automation platform provider offering RPA and intelligent document processing for enterprise automation at scale.

item.title: Botminds AI
item.description: Botminds AI is a no-code agentic AI platform provider offering intelligent document processing with proprietary AI algorithms and integrated document automation.

item.title: Captova Technologies
item.description: Captova Technologies provides high-speed intelligent document processing for secure and business environments with processing speeds exceeding 100 pages per second.

item.title: Cinnamon AI
item.description: Cinnamon AI is an enterprise AI company offering Flax Scanner, an AI-OCR platform for automated data extraction from unstructured documents without template definition.

item.title: ClearDox
item.description: ClearDox is an AI-powered commodities intelligence platform providing intelligent document processing and automation solutions for commodity trading operations.
